```py
BloomFilter {
    Integer: size
    Integer: k
    Array of bits: bins
    Array of hash functions: h
}
```

```py
BloomFilterInsertKey(BloomFilter: filter, Type: key):
    Integer: i = 0
 WHILE i < filter.k:
        Integer: index = filter.h[i](key)
        filter.bins[index] = 1
        i = i + 1

BloomFilterLookup(BloomFilter: filter, Type: key):
    Integer: i = 0
    WHILE i < filter.k:
        Integer: index = filter.h[i](key)
        IF filter.bins[index] == 0:
            return False
        i = i + 1
    return True
```
